Farewell, Dachande and Kinger. Its been great RPGing with you guys. 
I'll make a "reserved" section for the Char page and put your 
characters on it, so they will be safe.

::Shredder::

Shredder entered the gateway behind Magmatron. He was gone now, but 
when the Destrons returned, so would he.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  The destrons arrived in the sulaco. They saw the gateway open. They 
looked 
> at eachother. "Lets go home" They all jumped through the gateway and 
they 
> where gone.
> 
>      OCC: I would like to reserve my chars megastrom, neptune, 
guiledart, if
